pkgmetadata.longdescription: An IPython magic extension for printing date and time stamps, versionnumbers, and hardware information.Contact=============If you have any questions or comments about watermark,please feel free to contact me viaemail: mail@sebastianraschka.comThis project is hosted at https://github.com/rasbt/watermarkThe documentation can be found athttps://github.com/rasbt/watermark/blob/master/README.md
